articles.title: Chelsea held as 8/10 Mount shines but 5/10 Hudson-Odoi a subbed sub - ESPN
articles.description: Chelsea dominated proceedings but needed a Mason Mount penalty to save a point, while sub Callum Hudson-Odoi was embarrassed.
articles.content:
Southampton ended Chelsea's five-match winning run to hold them to a 1-1 draw at St Mary's Stadium.
